column4: Hi   I bought a new 19" widescreen monitor.. trying to use 1680 x 1050, but the highest it'll let me go is 1440x990.  It's 1080i compatible.. and I can go higher on other OS's.  Any ideas on how to do this?  I'm guessing my only way is editing xorg?
do you know which 19" it is?  most 19" are 1440x900 only

ya.  this is fine.  we just need to configure your ubuntu
first, what video adapter are you using?
have you installed the 'nvidia' proprietary driver for this card?
